content.rendered:
Features & Functions
· 4.3 inch TFT Color Monitor
· Touch Button Embedded on Panel

· 2-way audio communication over analog network
· Support up to 4 tenant stations / 2 entrance stations

VDP04-B4 Kit
Villa Style Analog Video Door Phone

Tenant Station Description & Specifications Entrance Station Description & Specification

OS Linux
Screen Resolution 480*272
Communication Interface CVBS

Speaker Dual Speakers, 8Ω / 2W
Installation Method Indoor Wall Mount
Color White
Working Temperature -20°C to +60°C
Power AC 100 – 240V
Certificate CE, FCC, RoHs
Dimensions (W*H*D) 195*185*30 (mm)

Camera 1MP
Camera Viewing Angle 80o
Nighttime Visual Range 0.2M-1M
Dimensions (W*H*D) 127*85*40 (mm)
Installation Method Outdoor Wall Mount
Relay Unlock NO, NC, COM
Color Black
Working Temperature -20°C to +60°C
Water & Dust Proof IP54
Power AC 100 – 240V
Certificate CE, FCC, RoHs

excerpt.rendered:
VDP04-B4 Kit is the ideal and economic video door phone solution kit which includes slim design 4.3inch TFT display
monitor, outdoor full metal call station with IP54 rating as well as the accessories &brackets. Moreover, the handy
installation and crystal clear intercom bring you the excellent experience beyond imagination.
